import React from "react"; import { FaImages } from "react-icons/fa6"; import { FadeLoader } from "react-spinners"; import { FaRegEdit } from "react-icons/fa"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { profile_image_upload } from "../../store/Reducers/authReducer"; const Profile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { userInfo } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); const image = true; const loader = true; const status = "active"; const add_image = (e) => { if (e.target.files.length > 0) { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("image", e.target.files[0]); dispatch(profile_image_upload(formData)); } }; return (
{image?.image ? ( ) : ( )}
{" "}
Name : {userInfo.name}
Email : {userInfo.email}
Role : {userInfo.role}
Status : {userInfo.status}
Payment Account :

{status === "active" ? ( {userInfo.payment} ) : ( Click Active )}

{!userInfo?.shopInfo ? (
) : (
{" "}
Shop Name : Easy Shop
Divission : Dhaka
District : Rajbari
Sub District : Vola
)}

Change Password

); }; export default Profile;
